result.title: Where to train System Design skills for interview?
result.content:
Hi everybody!

Question:

Everybody knows Ð¡odeforces is really helpful in increasing skills to solve ordinary and not ordinary problems. Great thanks for that. And it is not a secret very often such kind of problems is being asked on interview in companies like Amazon, Microsoft, Google etc.

However, some problems on interview are from area of testing and area of System Design. And there is a question:

Where to train System Design skills, for different level of knowledge base?

Thanks

UPD: There is cool q&a about. Thank you, OutSide!
